subject: Brake pedal optimization
description_text:
Good morning,

I would like to know if you could help me optimize my brake pedal?

When I calibrate my brake pedal in the software, I get a maximum pressure
force of 30kg. Is it better to leave the maximum pressure force as the
value in the software?
Do I need to enter 28 kg into the software to reach 100 kg of pressure more
quickly and ensure I always have access to 100%?
Or should I enter a little more in the software (for example 32 kg) so that
I never reach 100%?

Please explain.
